entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Wet snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then wet snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
